attributes.action: Compel the banks to settle all bank reclaim requests that are in progress before the high court case begins.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Thousands of people are extremely angry this morning as the OFT have agreed the banks can waiver all claims for refunds on bank charges, this is extremely unfair my claim has been ongoing since MARCH and I was nearly there now it seems I may have to wait upto a year this is not fair!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
